No upload, No Saas

CUSTRA | Auto Screenshot Tool runs locally and saves outputs to your computer. No account required. No upload. Your files stay in your control.No subscription, one-time purchase.

Feature highlights

Minimal workflow
Start ‚Üí select region ‚Üí stop. Results are ready in a folder.

Better signal-to-noise than manual screenshots or raw screen recording.

üôã FAQ

Common questions about CUSTRA | Auto Screenshot Tool.

üíª Does it support macOS and Linux?
The current demo is Windows-only. We may add macOS and Linux support later.
üé¨ Is this screen recording?
No. It samples every second and saves key change frames as PNGs. You can also turn on loop capture as a fallback.
‚ùì Why not just record the screen?
For most meetings and classes you only need the key slides and switches, not a long video. Key frames are easier to search and better for notes.
üìÅ Where are files saved?
Locally: output/<task>/images/*.png. If you enable audio (Windows), you get output/<task>/audio/audio.wav.
‚òÅÔ∏è Does it upload to the cloud?
No. It runs and saves everything on your machine.
